title: Crock Pot Recipe: Lightened Up Sweet & Spicy Veggie Curry (vegan)
directions: Coat your crock pot with olive oil. Put your onion in the crock pot along with the spices and stir to coat it well in the spices. Add the rest of the ingredients in the first list and stir to mix it up. Cover and cook on low for 6 hours or until the sweet potatoes are cooked through.
15 minutes before it’s done, put in the coconut milk with salt & pepper and stir to combine well and thoroughly. Cook for 15 more minutes.
Serve right away, preferably on just-cooked rice.
ingredients: garlic powder, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, ground ginger, curry powder
½ cup carrots, chopped (I used baby carrots)
½ can chick peas, rinsed and drained
